website_summaries.verdict: Portable and waterproof Bluetooth speaker that delivers a better quality of sound than you'd expect.
pros: This speaker will work in water depth to 1 m for up to 30 min., so it's great for the shower or a float in the pool for a short amount of time
Easy to make a connection with a mobile device over Bluetooth
Speaker offered in multiple fun colors and designs
Includes a sturdy loop, so you can hang it off your clothing or backpack

website_summaries.verdict: For its size, the affordable and durable UE Wonderboom is one of the fullest sounding mini Bluetooth speakers you can buy.
pros: The Wonderboom is compact, fully waterproof, plays very loud for its size with a good amount of bass for its small size
It also floats in water, is shock resistant and has decent battery life
You can pair two Wonderbooms together to augment the sound
cons: It's slightly too bulky for travel use

customer_reviews.title: It has a really nice sound and the range has been perfect for what ...
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking at a different, more expensive speaker, but after reading some reviews I decided to go with this one and I was pleasantly surprised. It has a really nice sound and the range has been perfect for what I use it for. The only negative aspect to this is that there is no way to tell when the charge is running out. It would be nice to have some type of indicator to let you know when the battery is low. Other than that I am pretty happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mc

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box and it connects to my phone but skips every few seconds even with the phone next to the speaker. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meoconnor32

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER FROM BIGGA BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER FROM BIGGA BUYS. I recieved a Wonderboom Speaker in not original packaging and the serial number is crossed out. I'm scared to use the product
customer_reviews.author: Samantha P

customer_reviews.title: no audio cable jack
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are an Apple fanboy, you will react to the lack of a 3.5 mm audio jack with similar amazement and disappointment. My audiophile friends assure me that bluetooth is not the preferred connection for audio and I use it only when the cable is not convenient. This device is useless to me and I can't believe they fail to mention that they took that off this version, as I would have ordered a different model. Now I have to do another return . . . bother . . .
customer_reviews.author: wjt

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Love the speaker but the charge isn't holding, making it useless and a complete waste of money. Very disappointed as I've had this exact speaker before and didn't have that issue. Tried to contact support but it takes me to the logitech website which doesn't make sense since it's not a Logitech product. Have been traveling so I haven't been home to return it within the allotted window and now am stuck with a speaker that doesn't work. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update - Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding portable speaker I've ever used. It's gotten wet plenty and still works perfectly Update 10/28/2018 For some reason the range of this device is less than 3 feet for me. I have tried restarting the device, removing and adding the device to my phone. tried 3 other phones. No help The device works great when the phone is left directly next to the device, but is unusable if you need to walk any distance away. Not sure if my device is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: The 360 degree sound (which is really just 2 speakers - one on each side) really works great to put on a coffee table in the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually blown away by this speaker! The 360 degree sound (which is really just 2 speakers - one on each side) really works great to put on a coffee table in the middle of the room. The volume is incredibly loud for the size, and can be heard even with 10 people all singing loud... Don't ask me how I know that.
customer_reviews.author: David Wall

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, loud sound effects that can't be turned off.
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple other excellent UE products, and was excited for these speakers. UE made a big mistake with this model, and included LOUD and obnoxious sound effects for every action on the speakers, including startup, shutdown, pairing and linking. UE has apps for their other speakers that allow you to turn off the sound effects. There is no way to turn off the sounds for Wonderbooms. So these speakers are useless in any environment where you won't weird random sounds playing at loud volume all the time.
customer_reviews.author: "jad22805"

customer_reviews.title: Cool "grenade"
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best portable speakers I've heard The bass _could_ be better, but sound nature requires bigger speakers and chassis. So, all in all - very good. It is loud, it does not rattle at highest sound level. It is waterproof (did not test yet and doubt will test intentionally). Easy to connect and easy to carry. Weight is about pound. What I don't like: buttons are placed in a "cross" shape, like a holy grenade (Worms Armageddon, hi!:) )
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: quality and volume of sound is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was in a apple store in Italy and asked a technician for the best small portable speaker in terms of volume and quality of sound. I have a hearing loss and I give briefings from my laptop and wanted a small, quality speaker. This for sure did not disappoint. I subsequently purchased 12 more for my grandchildren for Christmas. The design is also cool! As an aside this is my 2nd Logitech speaker. I still have the 1st one I purchased for my desktop computer at work in 2012. The speakers have been to 7 different countries with me and in all environments and they still work great! I absolutely love the Wonderboom speaker!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Bad bass and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity issues and the bass comes through terribly, to he point you can’t play it more than a third of the total volume. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: New? No. Box had been opened and obviously retaped.
customer_reviews.text: ClicknGrab is the 3rd party seller of the Wonderboom LE Ultimate Ears I purchased. The following is the email I sent to them: "This item has been opened prior to my receiving it. What the heck? NOWHERE in it's description was it stated that this is an "open box" or "used" item. This was a gift but, not anymore... I am disappointed in your business, quality of your business practices, deceptive item description and will make certain that I never again order from your company." Am trying to charge this speaker and don't know how well it will work. As this was a gift, it's extremely disappointing that the packaging had already been opened and likely a used (and returned).
customer_reviews.author: AZ lady

customer_reviews.title: This sounds better than our Bose speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker I have two of them, and they are incredible! The sound comes out all the way around so you can put it anywhere and the sound fills the space. The bass is deep without losing the middle tones. It’s lived through plenty of drops and falls and has no signs of wear. Pros: amazing speaker, durable, easy to connect to, long battery life Cons: I would like more light color options to blend with room decor better
customer_reviews.author: Well Hello

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality on this little speaker is amazing! I was pleasantly surprised at the clarity of ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this little speaker is amazing! I was pleasantly surprised at the clarity of sound-even as I cranked the music up loud! Also seems nice and durable, as I've used it out while tubing lazily down a river and it was hooked onto a cooler. I wish it came with a better informational pamphlet-I had to hope to find out that you can fast forward songs by tapping the icon on the center of the top. But once I found some of those hidden features, I have LOVED this product, and recommend it to any of my friends looking for a durable waterproof speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality audio
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs quite a punch. Have had no issues with connecting to my MacBook Pro, iPad Pro 12.9 (2018), or my iPhone XS Max. The build quality is nice. I put a clip on it to hang on my bag while traveling. I have used it to listen to music in the shower and have had no issues. Haven’t tried throwing it in my pool though. Will have to wait until summer to try that. I’m not an audiophile so I can’t tell you that this is the best or worst audio quality out there, but for generic listening to while cleaning or working out at home, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound from a big small speaker
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to bluetooth portable speakers they seem to be either OK or wow that's a lot from a small unit. This is a wow, but not the smallest of units. It's bigger than most of its palm sized competitors, and has some decent heft. It's absolutely portable, but just a bit on the chunky side. I would say the heft and size are worth it. The sound quality is very good. Deep bass, decent midrange and highs. Pairing with my phone was as easy as turning it on and finding it in the Bluetooth settings. Great little speaker for an office, master bath, kitchen or bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Peffinger

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Range is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my brookstone floating speaker that my child took and I am glad that I chose UE Wonderboom. Pros Bluetooth reaches from all around my home, even when I am in a different room Waterproof Cons Would only play one song at a time with the mate se native music player (had to select the next song individually); not an issue with VLC or google music Could not get the skip to the next song feature with the button on the speaker. Pauses the music everytime. Update: my apple phone lets me skip the song. Not android Decent Bass, and pool friendly. If I find any other complaints I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: El Pitufo Grunon

customer_reviews.title: Love it (For a good price)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: IPX7 waterproof Small and portable Massive sound for size Solid build quality Cons: Very minimal base No headphone jack to use with non Bluetooth devices Middle button on top is hard to press in Price I would recommend this speaker if you can get it on sale like I did for 60$, other than that you should go for mega booms tower speakers or JBL flip series, if you want a speaker to bring around everywhere, then yeah, great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel speakers
customer_reviews.text: We host and attend an annual camping weekend with family and friends. We purchased these little music bombs to have some music around our camping compound. These little guys are great! Paired together, you can have music or audio from one end of the camp compound to the other. We even took these out to the beach and had them set up on our raft so we could have party tunes on the sandbar. The only drawback is only being able to connect up to 2 units together.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeerFather

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price 👍
customer_reviews.text: Big sound! Sound quality is excellent. I've had it for a while and I have to say I am still for the majority of time happy with it. I think it's a great buy for the price. My only complaint is that the battery doesn't last as long as they claimed. At best I get 3-4 hrs of constant play on this before the red light comes on. The specs claimed that the battery lasts up to 10hrs. Even new out the box I never got that many hours of play. As for the waterproof part, I have never put it to the test so can't give any advice on that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Yungloveful

customer_reviews.title: It suits me well
customer_reviews.text: I come from a UE ROLL experience (2 years using it) and needed an update cause the model sustained heavy drops and wanted a new speaker. Therefore I stayed with the brand. However, I was worried on the form of the speaker, since it has a different shape and way of hanging, which is super important in Portability. It's different but still very portable, comfortable, compact, and the sound is just great (considering most of the quality of the music comes form the file and not necessarily from the speaker).
customer_reviews.author: mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sound, and easy to take with you
customer_reviews.text: This little thing has pretty good sound, and it's very easy to carry around. Mine failed after 11 months or so but with the help of UE's customer service I got it working again :) While on a trip to the beach, the volume started to randomly go all the way up on its own. The fix was to perform some sort of hard-reset, and it's working fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Summer Time Necessity!
customer_reviews.text: This tiny but mighty speaker became the sound-supplier for the entire vacay due to the convenience (even when true speaker systems were available). Every day someone asked where to buy one because of the size + sound quality + waterproof exterior. Wonderboom was attached to the back of a boat while swimming & centered on kitchen island while entertaining . The ultimate test was securing Wonderboom to an inner tube with a bungee cord.. this little speaker never skipped a beat while going down rough river rapids. Bonus: multiple people could connect / play music without having the other person disconnect
customer_reviews.author: cmarie

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a bose
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 2 portable bose speakers, and have been looking for a good replacement. I heard this in action at a friends house, so I was fortunate to have that experience before making the purchase. I love the 360 degree speaker. We place it on our ottoman to get better sound when watching movies (bluetooth to Fire TV is fantastic!!!!). It is loud and has decent range. Keep in mind that the 5 stars represents this class of speaker: portable bluetooth. For this, compared to my bose and jbl I find it to be superior.
customer_reviews.author: T. J.

customer_reviews.title: Startup sound is too loud
customer_reviews.text: The startup and shutdown sounds this makes are both incredibly loud. So loud I worry about disturbing my neighbors. Totally unnecessary. There is not way to change the volume of it or turn it down either. Obnoxious. I also find the volume buttons on these to be very problematic as you can't press the edges of the oversized buttons: particularly the minus button.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as “new”. Packaging was speaker and charging cord in the bubble envelope used for shipping. Speaker’s appearance and sound was great, but battery wouldn’t charge. Without battery capabilities most features of this particular speaker are rendered useless. Ordered same speaker from different party on Amazon. Packaging was professional as if bought in a retail store and included useful instructions. Speaker works as advertised and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a different charger cable - don't fret!
customer_reviews.text: I love UE sound devices. I finally just upgraded from a UE Boom 2 after 5 or 6 years, I think, only because I lost the darn thing. This Wonderboom works just as great and has wonderful sound. The round shape is very satisfying and actually a lot more useful than the thin cylindrical shape of the UE Boom. Please be aware, though, of a *really* common faulty charging cable. I thought I had spent all this money on a broken speaker. Turns out many, many of these speakers were distributed with charging cables that don't work at all. Just use any other micro USB, and you're golden.
customer_reviews.author: Calli Force

customer_reviews.title: Can We Add Tornado Proof
customer_reviews.text: This awesome speaker survived an EF2 tornado that hit the school where I teach. My classroom was heavily damaged and I really had no hope of finding anything. I was surprised to find my speaker, dirty and wet in the rubble far away from my desk. I actually turned the speaker on today and HOLY COW it works and still sounds amazing. I am officially sold on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Speaker and Customer Service and Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these speakers in 2018. I wanted the ability to pair the two speakers for surround sound at the beach or parties. The sound is great. Everyone loves when I show up with them. Pairing them is easy. This year I began noticing that the sound coming from the speakers was breaking up. I reached out to the company. They replied and offered some standard steps to try to see if it helped. Unfortunately, none of those efforts worked. Well, they have replaced BOTH of my speakers free of charge!!!! I will forever be a fan and continue to recommend the brand. You can't beat service like that!
customer_reviews.author: M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is easy to take around and the sound is loud enough for me. The battery life on the other hand is not as described. Started playing on a fully charged battery around 8 am and by 11 am it was dead. Sending back because this is not what I payed for. Lovey product tho.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppy Mom

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE SPEAKER I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR!!
customer_reviews.text: After a few years of trying a variety of inexpensive ($35 and less) and 'decent' speakers, I recently splurged and purchased this. I AM IN LOVE. This. This is the speaker I have been wanting all along ... amazing sound (great volume, sufficient bass, crisp, clear), very easy to use (smart button placement - on other models I have purchased they were all close and when I meant to raise the volume, I would disconnect the Bluetooth by accident, etc.) and still compact. The 360 sound is a huge bonus, as is the waterproof feature. I think I will stick to this UE line of speakers forever now. Seriously. IN LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not Used, Just Not Original Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sounds even better! Seller advised prior to purchasing that the unit actually was not used, it just didn't have the original packaging. I haven't had any issues so far. Haven't used for long periods of time yet so I cannot attest to the battery life, but the sound quality is AMAZING!!!!! I think I lucked up and got the last pink one 😊 also, shipping was EXTREMELY FAST! It made it from California to Ohio in less than 48 hours. Icing on the 🎂 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bretagne

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Sound For A Small Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this speaker for just under a year now, and can honestly say it's the best portable speaker I've ever owned. It has crisp, high-quality sound, and has run up to 8 hours on continuous use. Its compact size makes it perfect for small spaces, and it has a neat little loop you can hang around hooks and small poles if you don't have anywhere to set it down. It can definitely pump out the bass most large speakers can, but at a more convenient size, and not requiring as much to spend. A must-have for any music lover!
customer_reviews.author: L. Duve

customer_reviews.title: Constant Audio Drop Outs
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get it to work. Audio constantly drops out every few seconds. I have paired, re-paired, tried different devices, etc. The audio will not stay on for more than a few seconds. Very disappointing. I tested this device with a number of devices and got the same results with all. Seller charged me a restocking fee for a defective item. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daro

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker but low battery life
customer_reviews.text: The bass sounds really good. It doesnt allow phone calls which is perfect for me because I find it annoying to speak through the speaker anyways. It has gotten wet and it hasnt caused problems. Its loud which i love. But it dies pretty quickly. I would say like 3-4 hours battery life. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a larger waterproof speaker that I had bought years ago that was fully submergible. I use it as a daily speaker and on the jetski. The only problem is that the small cord at the top started to break and wear down after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMissSmallWorld

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound from such a small package
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my wife and we are both highly impressed with it. I tested dozens of small bluetooth speakers in the under $150 range and this one had the best sound quality. Setup was super-easy and took roughly 5 seconds. My wife has used it many times since then and loves it. I, too, have listened to music using this speaker several times and am always impressed. The quality of the sound itself is fantastic and the volume level is amazing. It gets REALLY loud if you choose. With NO distortion. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tabe

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker to tote around with you
customer_reviews.text: This speaker puts out an impressive amount of sound given its size, and does so without distorting at the upper volumes. I have had no issues with connectivity or battery life so far. The only downsides that I have with this speaker is the lack of a 3.5mm headphone jack (something very useful when pairing with laptops or PC's) and the micro USB charging port (USB C would have been much nicer, allowing me to charge my phone and speaker with the same cable) All in all, a great little speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Taisto

customer_reviews.title: Love my Wonderboom
customer_reviews.text: After some exhausting research, I decided to go with the Wonderboom for a kayak trip. I wanted a quality speaker for under $100 (I’ve lost a speaker to the river before). Pleasantly surprised with how loud this speaker can get for how small it is. Deep, rich sound quality. It can be clipped to anything using a carabiner or tied to anything with a rope, and if for some reason if it were to come loose, the fact that it floats gave me peace of mind. Seems rugged enough to last quite a while, time will tell, but for now I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Korey Kleinsorge

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker with one flaw. Read on....
customer_reviews.text: That would have had a 5 out of 5 stars however the one bad thing was that the little shock cord loop that’s mounted on top ripped out when I hung the speaker on my ridge line while camping . The speaker fell to the ground. On the up side it’s going to be replaced and I will hAve to judge the next one as well and I will update this review if it was just a defect. This speaker is very waterproof. It does what it says it will. Also it floats quite well. It will play music underwater on high without taking any in.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: A lot to like for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Wonderboom is a very good product, especially for its price. Could you find a better bluetooth speaker for a couple hundred bucks? Of course you could. But if you want to spend less and still get some of the features of a high end speaker, this is the answer. Water resistant, easy to charge/store/clean, and puts out a respectable amount of base and sound without too much distortion. I love this product, in fact I have purchased two. I bought the first one at Best Buy as a gift, the second on Amazon for myself, and will probably buy another one in the near future so I can have one upstairs and one downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for less than 2 years and now it's completely shot
customer_reviews.text: We really liked it for all of the reasons that people have given it 5 starts... it sounded pretty great, it was easy to use, and you could take wherever you pleased. But now, less than 2 years since I bought it, the battery will no longer hold a charge and it's essentially a door stop. CAN PEOPLE PLEASE STOP MAKING DISPOSABLE PRODUCTS? Why can't I replace the battery? Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Galt

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is pretty good! It can't replace a good old fashioned ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy holds a charge for a really, really long time, and the sound is very loud. The sound quality is pretty good! It can't replace a good old fashioned two speaker/subwoofer situation, not even a medium, moderately priced one. I definitely noticed the difference between my $30 speakers from radioshack and this portable speaker that I purchased like ten years later, as in the former is better sounding, crisper and has more subtlety to it. But this thing sounds really good, it's really loud and you can take it in the shower, backyard, car, desk, kitchen, biking—wherever with you so that makes it a pretty solid investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Torem

customer_reviews.title: Delivered exactly what we needed and more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to use while golfing and it is awesome! Small enough to clip on bag while walking or set in cup holder when riding. Sound is great and the 360 sound is amazing. Our friends like it so much, they bought 2 of them. I am going to buy one for myself as well. The fact that you can tie 2 of these speakers together is fantastic as well. For the price point, this speaker definitely delivered on what we need. At max volume the sound isn’t quite as perfect, but we NEVER have to set the volume that loud either, so it is kind of a moot point.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable loss in quality at high volume. Total bummer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. No, I wanted to LOVE this speaker. I've had it on my list for a long time before the price dropped low enough for me to make the investment. I was so disappointed. At low volume, the sound quality is fine. Once it got a little louder, however, it had a subtle but DEFINITELY noticeable loss in quality. And I'm not even a sound person! I just wanted this for listening to music around my house while I do projects and whatnot. Unfortunately, I couldn't deal with it. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this quite a bit, and I've tested out how well it does in water. The sound is fine, about what you expect from these. It absolutely does float - by float I mean it stays just submerged at the top of the water surface, but doesn't sink. Once the speaker gets wet the sound gets temporarily distorted, shake it off and it sounds perfect again. Do yourself a favor and get a carabiner so you can attach it to things.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Great little waterproof speaker
customer_reviews.text: Mainly bought this to have a speaker in the shower that I could get wet without any worries. Been using it for a while without any issues with sound quality or connectivity. Typically I will have the speaker in the shower and my phone will be in the bedroom charging and no issues with sound quality there either. The only time there was connectivity issues is when my girlfriend and I were both connected to the speak at the same time. We turned off bluetooth on one of our phones and had no further issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Powerhouse of Sound
customer_reviews.text: No regrets at all. My Bose Soundlink Mini of 3 years died on me. I purchased this product after much research on bluetooth speakers. No other speaker will give you as much bang for your buck. Waterproof, sexy, durable, easy connectivity, amazing sound. I recommend this product without reservations. UPDATE I took this device with me into the shower. No issue what so ever. The waterproofing of this device is hard core.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thomas Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound with so-so battery.
customer_reviews.text: First, the good: It sounds amazing. Literally the best portable speaker I've heard. Better than ones 3x the price. People ask me almost every time I have it on, "All that is coming from that one little speaker?!" Now the not-so-good: Battery lasts about 4 hours on a good day, from full charge to shut down. In itself, not a bad run time, but the description says 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: mtnman

customer_reviews.title: Great for sounds on the water.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the journey home on our boat - 5000 miles along the pacific and up into the Caribbean and it has been a joy. Astounding battery life, great volume. Not so easy to figure out what battery level is left if you forget what each of the sounds indicates, but perfect otherwise. It got wet a fair few times but never fell off the boat so can’t comment on its claim to being water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery life but the auto shut off sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This puts out a great sound . Loud and clear. Only complaint I have it the manufacture saw fit to add a auto shut off with no way of disabling it. I use this with my laptop and it is very annoying that it keep turning itself off after 5 or 6 mins without sound going to it. I understand it having auto shut off if it is running off it's battery but if you are running USB power then it should not auto shut off. This is why it only got two stars instead of 5. I hate auto shut off in anything and we should have the ability to disable that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Donald N.

customer_reviews.title: Interference?
customer_reviews.text: I used this on vacation and experienced it switching from my music to someone else music, possibly in the next room in the hotel. It only did it the first two nights so I don't know if it was another persons device connecting and disconnecting. The other thing I don't like is when it first connects, it is very loud. You can't turn it down on the initial connection and it is very very loud.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you need to use the STRAP to secure it to ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: See my PIC - literally 2nd time using and would have lost the unit if someone had not been skiing right behind me. It's a bungie like material andI have two of these speakers and inspected my other one and it's also 2 weeks old and used two times and you can see where it will likely let go as well. I was going back up the chair lift and guy next to me asked about my speaker and said the Same thing happened to his,, strap broke after using it for a few months. Hard to imagine this is anything but a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but for how long?
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound of this product. Bought it for a beach vacation so I had some tunes, but didn't want it to get damaged if the surf came up quickly or it was subjected to sand. Overall, it worked great, but my first session only lasted about 6 hours before it died. About the same with the next session. Not sure if I got one with a bad battery or it takes some cycling to go for 10 hours. Debating on returning it for another.
customer_reviews.author: Caniac Nation

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing!
customer_reviews.text: Beach Vacation. Yes brought it loved it. Filled our umbrella up with sound and I walked out and it was really low so perfect for people who don't wanna be that one person with the loud obnoxious speaker. Shower? Yesssss. Every morning I'm alone in my house it's perfect. Bath time? Yes perfect for that. Work?? I sell these at my current job. So I already had used one previously. But I had a second job as a front desk associate let me tell y'all. That was borning. No music dead at night. Perfect for my little area I was at. OH AND I LOVE USING THIS WHILE I'M COOKING.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Here comes the boom
customer_reviews.text: We charged this up and started using it as soon as it was delivered. Its been about a week. The thing didn't die until yesterday. So imo battery life is awesome. The sound is great, we only use it in the house to listen to music but the all-around sound is a nice touch. Plus it's super cute. I have the grey and yellow one.
customer_reviews.author: Glamtron88

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT PAIR WITH OTHER UE BOOMS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start out and say that I absolutely LOVE UE Boom products! This Wonderboom would have gotten 5 stars EXCEPT, it cannot pair with any other UE Boom!!!!! I was so disappointed as I was preparing for a family reunion party in the backyArd...... only to find out after much research that Wonderboom are only allowed to be with other Wonderbooms. Oh well, thanks Amaon for having such an easy return system!😊
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Borgel

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the XB20, but close!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is really cute (especially in the pink and purple colors), but the sound wasn't as good as the Sony XB20, so I returned the Wonderboom. I have no need for something waterproof and resistant to abuse because I only plan to use it at home and I'm a careful person. If you need those features, though, this has good sound and nice bass. It gets a little muddled at higher volumes, but for the price + features, it's an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. V. O.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Fine battery.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life isn't as high as I would expect, but otherwise, I would confidently recommend this product. It lasts a decent amount of time but always seems to die while I'm still cleaning the house or in the middle of something. The battery life in the description is misleading. I think the louder you use it the shorter the life. When I'm using it at a party or camping it tends to die way faster than it should.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Rule

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is pretty much the definition of bang for your buck. The sound quality is pretty good for such a small speaker, but it has trouble hitting some of the low notes below 50 ish hz. The biggest problem is that when you turn it on, it emits a loud noise to indicate that it has turned on. As far as I know there is no way to turn this noise down. Overall I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: WonderBOOM!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love our wonderbooms! We received one as a gift several years ago and it’s still rockin’! Technically, the first one is hubby’s, so recently bought this one in orange for myself. I use it inside and outside, at home and the office. The sound is clear and loud when I want it to be with easy adjustment. Color is cool too. I have not tried pairing the two as we tend to use them separately, but will definitely try it when social activities can resume (optimism, people!) ). Buy it! Life is short and there is music to be played loudly and with gusto!
customer_reviews.author: GilbertGardener

customer_reviews.title: If Only I could Turn the Pair Tone Off
customer_reviews.text: I would give this speaker 5 stars if it wasn’t for the loud jarring pair tone that is played whenever it is turned on and off and also when it pairs with a device. I love everything about the speaker. It does everything I was looking for - nice sound, easy to use, and portable but ... I dislike the annoying sound so much and I would have returned it if I was not so busy that I didn’t get a chance to before the deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable Bluetooth speaker that packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy might not seem like much at first, but don’t be fooled by its small size or tame demeanor. It’s the Bruce Lee of speakers! We’ve been using it to get noise complaint tickets and deafen small animals. It’s so loud that ringing in your ears is a 24k blue diamond! It’s so loud it’s not an 808 it’s an 8008.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazing Caffeiney!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT🦄
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the speakers just wanted I wanted especially the color. I am a unicorn 🦄 type of woman. This feeds my spirit animal so much. It’s loud asf 360 all-around just how I liked it. Been wanting some speakers for a while now because I love music and I made a good choice (I’ll update y’all in about a month's time on sound and durability).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Doll

customer_reviews.title: Used once and it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading the great reviews but the first time we used it I took it on our float trip and 30 minutes later it stoped working! we kept it on the charger at night so I knew it would be fully charged for our float. The volume buttons does not work . I have tried to contact someone to replace this product but no luck!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, inaccurate instructions
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars because it's just what I wanted for by the pool where I'm too paranoid to use my good Bose BT speaker and my echo dot, both of which are not waterproof. It's small but has good sound for a speaker at this price. Decent sound is important to me and I also chose it because it's IPX7 waterproof. I therefore have to wonder about the insert, which has absolutely no instructions (not that's it's hard to figure out how to use it) other than safety warnings and a strict admonition to not expose to water and rain.
customer_reviews.author: gaedfly

customer_reviews.title: Small in Size, Loud in Volume
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect surround-sound with this speaker (I only bought one) but if you are looking for a portable speaker to listen to music or watch movies to, this does the trick very nicely. It's small size also means that it doesn't take up much space. The only downside is that it automatically switches off (even when plugged in) if it is not in use. There are times when I just want to pause the music and it automatically disconnects after a while. Not life-threatening but life-irritating.
customer_reviews.author: N N

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 360° of sound quality with impressive max volume level and monster battery life!! I've taken this bad boy on all-day golf outings and it lasts longer than my game. Fits great in cup holders or can be hung via the little rope loop feature on it. Water resistant capability also makes this thing perfect for use in the bathroom when listening to golf advice podcasts in the shower or when trying to retrieve your golf ball from a nearby river, pond, or stream.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker for my mom she saw it in Best Buy and really wanted it. I saved a little money by purchasing it through Amazon. She loves it, takes it on all of her trips, easy to pack, easy to carry and has great sound. She's 80 years old and says it's user-friendly and is compatible with any Bluetooth device.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Foster

customer_reviews.title: It's dead ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product just over a year ago, June 2017. And last month, it started refusing to hold a charge and now is refusing to charge at all -- even turning on. I have tried everything posted online to restore it, reset it, freeze it, but nothing .... any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Gina Butler

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if it's worth it?  It is.
customer_reviews.text: Packs some big boom into a device no bigger than a man's fist. I connect it to multiple devices, phone, PC. Primarily, I use it for PC gaming. No, it's not going to give you 5.1 surround. But it will give you reasonable highs and lows. All in all, very pleased. So pleased, we own three of them.
customer_reviews.author: KDodds

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressive sound from a relatively small speaker. It's been wet, and dropped and still works like new, and the battery lasts for a long time. Definitely worth the money! Update : 2-2019 It still works as well as when it was new! Very, very happy with this - It sounds amazing for the size, I've taken it camping, kayaking, camping, I listen to it daily in my professional kitchen and it despite the abuse it continues to perform like new. Buy one. You won't be disappointed. And I'm not getting paid 😋
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the size.
customer_reviews.text: So much power on this little speaker. This is the second one I own. My first speaker was gifted and was used almost everyday in a patio, sound quality never disappointed, the battery life did decrease with time. It’s able to pair with other speakers of its kind making surround sound amazing. Easy to carry and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Vianey Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: This particular model sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker would be top notch if the battery life lasted more than two hours. I received this speaker in the first week of December and after two months, (in February) the speaker started to die on me just after two hours. And it takes about two hours to charge. Pros: Loud sound And super portable. water proof.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great classical, blues, pop!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional, classically musician. I’m usually so picky about sound quality, that I rarely listen to music from my phone. This speaker sounds fantastic and fills up a room nicely! My old car has crummy speakers - so sometimes I take this speaker in my car if I’m driving long distances. Totally worth the small investment.
customer_reviews.author: Harpist1

customer_reviews.title: Good Sounding but Mine Had A Defective Port Cover 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is a great sounding speaker but this one that I got made some static clipping sounds and the back door the USB port cover does not sit flush and it easily pops open because of the improper seal. 🤨 Pretty much making it non waterproof. And the top has imperfections. See pics. 🤔 Dissapointed in the fit n finish. May be a dud. IDK. Will update when I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bang for your buck, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker delivers delivers a huge high end sound with a massive bass punch that rivals a much larger speaker. It claims to carry a 10 hour battery life, but after I charged it up it lasted a full 18 hours nonstop at a moderate volume level. The shape is a little clumsy, it reminds me of a softball, but it also feels very durable, and again the sound and battery life far-exceeded my expectations so i can easily overlook the shape. Im ordering a 2nd Wonderboom so that i can utilize the sync function to listen to music in stereo. I wasn't paid or compensated in any way to write this review. I was inspired.
customer_reviews.author: mike bigger

customer_reviews.title: It’s only ok.
customer_reviews.text: I got this based on the Wirecutter review to replace a Bose that died. I wish I would have gotten another Bose. This speaker sounds fine, but not great. It is definitely waterproof and the battery lasts forever, which is nice. But, the speaker doesn’t sound good enough for a living room, etc.
customer_reviews.author: yop

customer_reviews.title: Best quality shower radio that I have found to date.
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth different brand of shower radio that I have purchased for my teens. I bought the blue and the black one. All of the previous radios have died within days, weeks or months. These are more expensive but feel such better quality. So far they holding up well. They are LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent little product
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing with this for a several weeks now. I bought it for my boat for use on deck while sailing or at anchor. This is an excellent little product. Solidly built, easy to connect to my iPhone and iPad and quite remarkable sound quality. Im probably going to get rid of my boat hardwired external speakers because they are exposed to salt, wet and weather and a constant connection problem issue plus this unit gives better sound then the marine speakers. I'll just bring this little thing up from down below when i want sound on deck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deep sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one as a gift after seeing one at relative's house. Amazing how much sound comes out of such a small package. Deep bass and only starts to get some distortion at high volume. No app required on iPhone, just powered on, and connected via bluetooth and good to go. Not sure of the battery life or how water-resistant it is at this point, but a lot of value and a great little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie115

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the best for its size! I've lost or broken 4 or 5 similar models and I've tried to replace this with other brands that have had good reviews and are a bit cheaper, but I keep coming back to this one. It has a better range than other speakers, so I can keep my phone in a more convenient location and still get good sound. The sound quality of this speaker, especially at higher volumes, is also superior to similar speakers.
customer_reviews.author: amber Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give a five star rating for sound quality as it sounds great for its size. But I have heard other speakers just as small sound better. What sets this apart is its durability. I have a two year old son who will carry this around and dance with it. As such it sometimes falls and rolls around on the hardwood floors and it still sounds great. So the durability outweighs its sound quality only by a little. I recommend this to anyone who needs a speaker tha sounds great and can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Arguelles

customer_reviews.title: The device just quits!
customer_reviews.text: Decide just gives up and quits playing, this is random!!! Not good! Yo it have to disconnect and reconnect so do restart the playing. Why??? I would had few to say it's a bad design. Who needs a speaker that doesn't work? I'll stay away from Urban Ears in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Xamiam

customer_reviews.title: I am loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it! Bluetooth was easy to connect, it came already charged (I am yet to find the charger or batteries). The boom is great and the size is small, blending into the decor in any room around the house. I use it to listen to my books on Audible as I clean/work around the house, when I am by myself and there is no one to disturb with my noise. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LizaJane

customer_reviews.title: Simultaneous Connection was a terrible idea
customer_reviews.text: I only have one complaint about the wonderboom, but it’s a big one. The “simultaneous connection” feature ruins any listening experience. The speaker will constantly switch connection if another Bluetooth enabled device is in the area. In other words, you can connect your smartphone, and if anyone else in your household is on their phone, they’ll accidentally hijack the speaker from you. Not even the cheapest Bluetooth speakers have given me this problem, and it’s such a frequent hassle, I say this speaker isn’t a worthwhile investment, even if the sound quality is practically unbeatable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Buying another one
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily in my hot tub. Sounds great, battery life is great, they say 10 hours, so I use it 1 hour for ten days then recharge it. It is great to take places, about the size of a baseball. A separate case is available too. I am thinking I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: sti

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to believe so much sound comes out of such a small speaker....
customer_reviews.text: My great aunt couldn't believe the sound and I got her one after she said she wanted one and the same for my sister. The bluetooth sound is crisp with fidelity and even loud it doesn't get distorted. Water resistant too and I live in Florida. Great little speaker for the money. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar A. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive sound quality in such a small factor. Battery last a very long time and you can take it anywhere (dry or wet conditions). I've noticed if you have multiple sources connected to it (both iPhones paired to the speakers), you will experience 'clipping' sounds. You need to disconnect manually from one source and the 'clipping' will go away. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Contributor

customer_reviews.title: My Absolute Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've had his for a while, and it hasn't failed me. I wasn't pleasantly surprised when buying this after my bose soundlink had failed me. This sounds amazing, has awesome battery life, it's waterproof!!!!, too. I bring this everywhere with me. I highly recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker sounds amazing for how tiny it is. I use it daily and love it. I live on a beach so it was essential that I had something that was waterproof and easy to clean of sand. This has been the best purchase I have had in a long time. I use it outside with wind and still you can hear the music. I also use it for my projector at home for in home movies and works wonderfully with the bluetooth. My favorite speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sayde

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My go to speaker. battery last a long time and I am super happy with it! Have had it over 6 months and I use it constantly
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dickson

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets! Love it! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Best item I have ever bought off of Amazon! My son told me about it. Very easy to use and wonderful sound. I use it in the car, and take it with me outside. Absolutely love the speaker. The sound is awesome! It Bluetooth connects with your smart phone or device. I did a lot of research before buying this. Love the size. Has two color options. No regrets! Love it!✔️
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: I just love this speaker. It was easy to pair with my Tab 3 tablet and the sound quality is just fantastic. It has a clear bass and highs. I am using it in a bedroom to listen to music while I crochet! It fills up the 14' x 9' room plus others in the house complain that they can hear it!! Have not used outside yet.
customer_reviews.author: Fran M. Prisco

customer_reviews.title: Portable, sturdy, great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect (and I love the pink.) This little speaker gets pretty loud and the sound is great! I usually use it at home at pretty low volumes, so for me a single charge lasts a couple weeks. I've definitely tested the drop feature a few times by accident, and so far it's like new. I love the cylindrical shape for sound on all sides and the portability aspect. I remember reading a review that the on/off sound is a bit excessive, and I do wish it was not such a loud "thunk," but it's bearable. I'd definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: caiti rose

customer_reviews.title: The bass blew out a few weeks in...
customer_reviews.text: The Wonderboom's product marketing is pretty much true as it describes, but its bass already went fuzzy and distorted after getting it in January, a little more than a month in. I read and tried items online to try and repair, like forgetting/re-adding on my phone's Bluetooth, resetting, etc. Looks like it's a hardware thing. I listen to a lot of electronic music, but given the product's position as being a waterproof, travel sturdy product (and I bought a hard case for it), this is quite disappointing. The Wonderboom looks great, and it sounded great, but it may not be as hearty and robust structurally as some of its competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bensel

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, great sound, biggest bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Any size speaker from this company gives superlative sound at an affordable price. Reliable, fast- charging, clear sound, great range- I can’t sing the praises of this little speaker enough. It’s my fave and I also have its bigger brothers and sisters. Just the best sound for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriole

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good speaker
customer_reviews.text: The construction is solid. The sound is surprisingly full. There is even a small amount of bass, which really surprised me. You could easily fill a medium sized room with this speaker. The only con is that the volume buttons are hard and don't work perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Abishek

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth doesn’t work unless my phone is right next to it!
customer_reviews.text: The color is awesome. However, the Bluetooth isn’t working correctly. I thought it was me, but my 12 year old granddaughter has one that she can sit over 25 feet away from her iPhone and the sound is awesome. I have to keep my same I phone right next to it to work. Unfortunately, the time period for returning it has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Mathmama

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these and bought another one Bc I had to travel unexpectedly and forgot to bring it with me. I got stuck where I am Bc of Covid19. This little thing has been a life saver. I take it to the backyard listen to some jams or watch a movie on my iPad. It’s come in really handy and the sound quality is pretty good for something so small.
customer_reviews.author: Jax
